title.narrative: Ethiopia-Transport Sector Project in Support of RSDP4

description.narrative: The proposed Project Development Objective is to improve the condition of priority regional trade corridors and link roads being upgraded under this project.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Environmental & Social Safeguards. Section I.D.1, Schedule 2, Financing Agreement | Description: Obligations to:(i) implement the Project in accordance with the ESIAs, the EMPs and the RAPs and (ii) maintain within ERA an environmentalmonitoring and safety team with responsibility for ensuring the implementation of the ESIAs, the EMPs and the RAPs. Ongoing throughimplementation. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Institutional Arrangements. Section 1.A, Schedule 2 of Financing Agreement. | Description: ERA shall maintainfunction, staffing and resources to enable proper project implementation, satisfactory to the Association. Ongoing throughoutimplementation. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Progress Reports on FM Action Plan. Section II.B.4, Schedule 2 of FA. | Description :Obligation to furnishprogress reports on the implementation status of the Financial Management (FM) Action Plan. 45 days after the end of each calendarsemester. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Safeguards compliance reports. Section I.D.4, Schedule 2 of Financing Agreement. | Description: Obligation tocollect, compile and submit reports on the status of compliance with each of the ESIAs, EMPs and RAPs. On a quarterly basis. |Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Subsidiary Agreement. Section 1.B, Schedule 2 of Financing Agreement. | Description :A Subsidiary Agreementshall be executed between the Recipient and ERA, on terms and conditions approved by the Association. | Due Date :28-Jan-2013
